1462830.name: Super Sketchy Party
1462830.description:
Super Sketchy Party is a Drawing Guessing Game, not unlike Pictionary. What is great about Super Sketchy Party is that you can either play it locally with your friends on your couch or play it online with your friends with a big screen device (like a computer or an internet ready TV) and your smartphone.

  • Multiple Languages

  • All major Platforms supported

  • Mix and match Online and Couch Players

  • Public Games and Server Browser

  • Custom recorded Player Sounds

  • Cards with negative Effects for other Players

  • Narrator

  • Community Content

Super Sketchy Party supports crossplay with multiple friends in the same place and online combined in an easy way. Players can join a party locally or from anywhere with their own devices (no streaming required).

The game offers multiple languages, and the players can contribute content for all players in all languages to be enjoyed. Every player, who owns the game can submit their own phrases in their own language. If we and the community have enough phrases for a new language, it'll be added to the game.

The game comes with a native client but can also run on any device via its website. The game is identical and only requires a copy of the game on Steam.

Note: Only one player needs to own the game to host a party.

Note: macOS offers a client for the website, not a native client. A Steam login on startup is required.
1462830.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 保加利亚语, 简体中文, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 日语, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 瑞典语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 捷克语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 匈牙利语
